description: Non-Material Amendment of Planning Permission ref: 20/00946/FUL (Change of use of ground floor commercial unit from Class A1/A2/D1 (retail/financial & professional services/non-residential institution) to 3x C3 residential apartments, together with necessary external alterations to the ground floor and associated bin and bike storage). Amendments to consist of removal of one rear door into proposed flats and move the bins to screened bin stores at the frontage, with necessary internal layout changes. One visitor stand to rear omitted and 3 remain at the frontage

decision_conditions: The proposed amendments are considered not to be non material as provided for in section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The proposal is for partial discharge of Condition 42B (External Materials) of planning permission 20/02942/FUL to change to the colour of metal railing only. Officers note the application ref 23/01236/CLC (Details required for Condition 42 (Samples of Materials) Plot B Phase 1 of planning permission 20/02942/FUL) approved on 16.02.2024.The proposed railing colour RAL9005 Jet Black would be in accordance with Paragraph 4.18.2 of the Masterplan Design Guidelines that states:'Railing must be black in colour'As such the proposal is considered to be acceptable.For avoidance of doubt, this application solely relates to the colour of metal railings (and not to design/scale of enclosures) and other materials remain as approved under application ref 23/01236/CLC.

The proposed first floor plan has internal floor extension, however this extension has not been mentioned in the description, please clarify and revise the drawing. The first floor plan does not show the position of external grill and linkage to the external plant.Please provide  Proposed First Floor Plans with correct information at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of the entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works. The plans must also show the direction of North
